    <strong>Esbuild RNA</strong> â€¢ A framework for esbuild plugins with transform and emit capabilities.

---

## Install

```sh
npm i @chialab/esbuild-rna -D
```

```sh
yarn add @chialab/esbuild-rna -D
```

## Usage

```js
import '@chialab/esbuild-rna';
```
